name: 蘇莉芸
objective:
介紹含碳化合物的命名、結構與性質的基本概念。課程重點在反應機構、合成、立體化學、化學分析及儀器分析方法。
Fundamentals of structure and properties of carbon compounds. Emphasis on reaction mechanisms, synthesis, stereochemistry, as well as chemical and spectroscopic methods of analysis.
schedule:
1. Alkanes and Cycloalkanes: structure, nomenclature, physical and chemical properties.
2. Alkenes and Alkynes: structure, nomenclature, physical and chemical properties.
3. Reactions of Alkenes.
4. Chirality and the Handedness of Molecules.
5. Haloalkanes: structure, nomenclature, physical and chemical properties.
6. Alcohols and Ethers: structure, nomenclature, physical and chemical properties.
scorePolicy:
Evaluation 1-Usual activity (40 pts), Middle Exam (30 pts), Term Exam (30 pts), Additional score (10 pts)
Evaluation 2-Usual activity (30 pts), Middle Exam (35 pts), Term Exam (35 pts), Additional score (10 pts)
materials: Text book: "Fundamentals of organic chemistry", John McMurry, 2020, Cengage Learning Asia Pte. Ltd. ISBN 978-957-9282-58-1
consultation: Welcome to my office, Chemistry Building, room 204
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG12：負責任的消費與生產（Responsible Consumption and Production）
課程是否導入AI: ● 鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）
